item.description:
One week in advance of the Washington DC Second Amendment March on April 19, 2010 there will be a Connecticut March at the Capitol on Saturday April 10, 2010!


Mark your calendars! Get people together. Gun owners, hunters, target shooters, collectors and those who don't even own a gun, but support the Right To Keep And Bear Arms your presence is requested and YOUR VOICE MUST BE HEARD!!!!


This email is going out early so that there will be time to coordinate among Gun Clubs, Target Ranges , Gun Stores and anyplace pro-Second Amendment supporters can be reached!


There will be additional details coming soon - but start spreading the word to create buzz.


DON'T SIT BACK!!!! DON'T STAY HOME!!!! DON'T LET "THE OTHER GUY DO IT" YOU ARE THE OTHER GUY, YOU ARE THE NRA - Help Us Send a Clear Message To Hartford And Washington : NO MORE GUN LAWS!!


Second Amendment March - main site:


http://secondamendmen...


For questions, more information, to attend, etc. please contact Kevin Borgnis, State Coordinator for the Second Amendment March!


Connecticut coordinator is Kevin Borgnis

Kevin.Borgnis@SecondAmendmentMarch.com


Thank you!


Connecticut Shooters & Sportsmen


www.ctsas.info
item.name: CT Second Amendment March
